casebody.data:
No. 10-6496. Lamont Gist, Petitioner v. David DiGuglielmo, Superintendent, State Correctional Institution at Graterford, et al. 562 U.S. 1015, 131 S. Ct. 533,

178 L. Ed. 2d 392,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8529. November 1, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.
